entry.title: Music industry sings same song as nation with call for impeachment
entry.content: The music industry joined nationwide calls to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol for his "coup d'état," calling Yoon's supporters "forces of treason" for opposing his ouster. A coalition of 762 musicians, music producers and others working in the Korean music industry, whose name tentatively translates to the Korean Musicians' Alliance, released a statement on Friday evening calling for the impeachment of Yoon after his emergency martial law declaration that came on Dec. 3.
